title: Most popular leisure activities among adults in the U.S. 2013
summary: This statistic shows the most popular leisure activities among generation x in the united as of 2013 . During the survey , 19 percent of respondents from generation x stated spending time with family and friends as a favorite leisure activity .

data.Response: Spending time with family and friends
Playing video games and computer/internet games

gold: This statistic shows the most popular leisure activities among adults in the United States as of September 2013 . During the survey , 42 percent of the respondents named watching TV as their most preferred activity during leisure time .
